msg.msgText:
A "MessageHub" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update MessageHub help imaserver update MessageHub "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update MessageHub "Name=TestMH" "Description=Test Message Hub"
Configuration items for "MessageHub" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
